Splash_Screen_Description: Create notes and export them in universal format :)
Confirm_Reset_Note_Description: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
Modal_Settings_AutoSave_Description: Set the time interval for automatically saving your notes.
Modal_Settings_Language_Description: Choose the language of the application.
Global_Modal_Open_Note_Description: When you open a new note, your current note along with all your changes will be permanently deleted.
Global_Modal_Open_Note_Bold: Make sure you have exported your note before opening a new one.
Error_Editor_Folder: The EditorModules > EditorJS folder was not found in the application root.
Error_Notes_Not_Found: No notes were found, please create a new one
Error_Update_Note: Error when trying to update the note
Error_App_Update_Note: The application was unable to update the current note.
Error_AutoSave: An error occurred when trying to update the AutoSave settings
Error_AutoSave_Retrive: An error occurred while retrieving the AutoSave settings from the database
Description_Restart_Application: You need to restart the application for the new language settings to take effect
Error_Language_Update: An error occurred during the language update process
Error_Note_Export: An error occurred while exporting the note.
Error_Note_Import: An error occurred while importing notes
Error_Invalid_Json: The selected file does not contain valid JSON
Error_Invalid_Json_Key_Block: The JSON does not contain the required 'blocks' key
Error_Backup_File: Error when trying to create backup file
Error_Backup_Folder_Stats: Error getting statistics from backup folder:
Error_Backup_Folder_Exists: The backups folder does not exist
Error_App_Settings_Not_Found: The application settings were not found. The application needs to be closed.
Export_Note_Message: Choose the file type you want to export your note to:
Export_Note_Success_Message: The note has been successfully exported to the desired format.
